short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces mentions of Elon Musk with 'The Elongated Muskrat'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It simply replaces instances of "Elon Musk" and variants thereof and replaces them with "Elongated Muskrat". It is just for kicks, japes, shenanigans.
